name: Essentials Blue Notion Icons
description: Create a clean and minimalistic aesthetic for your Notion templates with this pack of Notion iconsTo use a custom icon:After downloading, unzip the folder containing the iconsIn Notion, click an icon (either at the top of a page or to the left of an inline page link)Click the "Upload an image" tabClick "Choose an image"Select your desired cover image (within the unzipped folder) and click "Open"
features: After downloading, unzip the folder containing the icons; In Notion, click an icon (either at the top of a page or to the left of an inline page link); Click the "Upload an image" tab; Click "Choose an image"; Select your desired cover image (within the unzipped folder) and click "Open"
